$description:
| What does this do? | Ensures email from external senders is identified in Outlook. |
| Why should you use this? | Emails from external senders are tagged and end users are informed about the origin of the email. |
| What is the end-user impact? | Users will see emails from external senders tagged in their inbox. User education is required. |
| Learn more | [Native external sender callouts](https://techcommunity.microsoft.com/t5/exchange-team-blog/native-external-sender-callouts-on-email-in-outlook/ba-p/2250098) |
